attr.title: Driven Out
attr.desc: Beautiful 16 bit retro art style with fluid animations and deliberate combat. Read the enemy and act accordingly in this seamless world without any load screens.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into assets folder. You can also use the free demo.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1054710/Driven_Out/) and copy all game files into `assets` folder. You can also use the free `demo`.
